title: Select Photo for a Press Release
description: A media relations coordinator is writing a press release about a player winning an award and needs to select an official photo to include.

tasks.description: Search the team's official photo archive for approved images of the player.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves all available photos of the player.

tasks.description: Filter the photos to find high-resolution images suitable for press use.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent narrows down the selection to a handful of high-quality photos.

tasks.description: Select the best photo and attach it to the press release.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent chooses the final photo and includes it with the press release distribution.
